title: How does your garden grow?
creator_credit: George Cass, Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Kevin Heinze shows young students various aspects of gardening using simple techniques suitable for the classroom. Topics covered are: Sowing seeds; propagating plants; potting up; carnivorous plants; Arbor Week.
